From: KSLawdogg@...

Ramhorn:

Ramhorn saluted Liono Prime.  "Yes, sir!" (First good order since I've joined 
this outfit), he though to himself, getting to a computer.  Fiddling with the 
controls, he set Plintissa on enemy in the Ark base.  <Prowl, I've noticed 
Plintissa is with you.  Her forces are attacking the Ark, you have orders to 
take her to a brig immediately.  If she attacks you in any way, shoot to 
kill.  That's an order.  Then get Iron Raptor to a CR chamber ASAP, then go 
help Striker!  Move!> An autogun from the cieling extended downward, its 
double barrels targeting Plintissa's chest.

Pressing a few more buttons from the bridge, two more autoguns opened fire on 
Wrath and Kamodia, a missile launcher firing a rocket off at Wrath's torso.
